title: Netflix Open Content
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Netflix finally opens up its content, but don't get too excited—it's still behind a paywall and you'll probably still feel like you're paying too much for it.

title: Nicolas Guillou, French ICC judge sanctioned by the US and “debanked”
author: lifeisstillgood
aiHeadline: French judge Nicolas Guillou gets sanctioned by the US and 'debanked,' proving once again that if you're not on the right side of the world's most powerful country, you might as well be a broke college student trying to buy coffee.

title: Go away Python
author: baalimago
aiHeadline: Python is so popular that people are literally writing blog posts titled 'Go away Python,' which is about as effective as telling the sun to stop shining or water to stop being wet.

title: Non-Zero-Sum Games
author: 8organicbits
aiHeadline: Non-Zero-Sum Games: Because why have fun when you can just make sure everyone loses? And by 'everyone,' we mean you, your enemies, and probably your pets too.

title: Show HN: 22 GB of Hacker News in SQLite
author: keepamovin
aiHeadline: Show HN: 22 GB of Hacker News in SQLite—because who doesn't want to relive the past decade of tech debates, flame wars, and the occasional insightful comment, all in one convenient, massive database? And by 'convenient,' we mean 'takes up more space than your average hard drive.'
